name: Fat Prisoner Simulator
description: Fat Prisoner Simulator - a soccer simulator where you play the role of a prisoner. The jail managers have noticed that some prisoners, who really like to eat a lot, can hardly go through the doors, including those of their cells.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 500 MB available space
